The energy knocks him over sideways causing the beam to miss.

OOC: Could you let them settle this dragon to dragon?  Go fight Luzbel 
if you want to fight a dragon, or D-13.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> OOC: Never accept damage? Apparently you havent seen many of my 
posts.
> 
> BIC:
> As Shadowstar latches onto the blade of energy with his mouth, Zero 
quickly 
> deactivates it freeing it from his jaws. He then points his left arm 
at 
> Shadowstar and opens fire on him with six blasts from his wrist 
blast as he 
> reactivates the beam sabre and slashes upwards at Shadowstars neck.
